verses.kjv: I was glad when they said unto me, Let us go into the house of the LORD.
verses.ct: It filled me with joy when people said to me, 'Let's go to the house of the LORD.'

verses.kjv: Our feet shall stand within thy gates, O Jerusalem.
verses.ct: Now we are standing inside your gates, Jerusalem.

verses.kjv: Jerusalem is builded as a city that is compact together:
verses.ct: Jerusalem is built as a city that is closely joined together,

verses.kjv: Whither the tribes go up, the tribes of the LORD, unto the testimony of Israel, to give thanks unto the name of the LORD.
verses.ct: where the tribes travel up — the tribes of the LORD — as required of Israel, to give thanks to the name of the LORD.

verses.kjv: For there are set thrones of judgment, the thrones of the house of David.
verses.ct: Thrones of justice are established there, the thrones of David's royal family.

verses.kjv: Pray for the peace of Jerusalem: they shall prosper that love thee.
verses.ct: Ask God for the peace of Jerusalem — may those who love you thrive.

verses.kjv: Peace be within thy walls, and prosperity within thy palaces.
verses.ct: May there be peace within your walls and security within your fortresses.

verses.kjv: For my brethren and companions’ sakes, I will now say, Peace be within thee.
verses.ct: For the sake of my brothers and friends, let me say, 'May peace be with you.'

verses.kjv: Because of the house of the LORD our God I will seek thy good.
verses.ct: For the sake of the house of the LORD our God, I will work for your well-being.
